name: NCT03640312_otherOutcomeMeasure_2_OG001
title: Rate of Adverse Events of Special Interest at 12 weeks for Candesartan in NCT03640312

observed.display:
Patients randomized to the comparison arm took a once daily 8mg candesartan.

Candesartan: Standard monotherapy of 8mg candesartan. Taken once daily for 12 weeks.
Rate of Adverse Events of Special Interest at 12 weeks -  (NCT03640312)
